item.title: 美国和英国工程师达成互认协议
item.description: 英国和美国的工程师达成了行业资格和执照互认协议，这将使专业人员在大西洋两岸工作更加方便。【原文：Engineers from Britain and the United States have struck a mutual recognition agreement of industry qualifications and licences which is set to make it easier for professionals to work on either side of the Atlantic.】

item.title: 聚焦：避开本土市场，韩国零售商扎堆美股
item.description: 韩国的母婴投资者不畏上周全球金融市场的颓势，将更多资金投入美股，分析师和投资者打赌，由于国内价值主张低迷，这一持续多年的趋势将继续下去。【原文：South Korea's mom-and-pop investors are defying last week's global financial markets rout by pouring even more funds into U.S. stocks, a years-long trend that analysts and investors bet will continue due to the depressed value proposition at home.】

item.title: 加州允许中国机器人出租车公司 WeRide 对乘客进行测试
item.description: 中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 已获得加利福尼亚州公共事业监管机构的许可，可以测试其载客无人驾驶汽车。【原文：China-based autonomous driving startup WeRide has received approval from California to test its driverless vehicles with passengers, according to a permit from the state's utility regulator.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构就交易平台更换问题起诉交易所运营商 ASX
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周三表示，将起诉澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX），指控其在更换交易平台 "清算所电子分册系统"（CHESS）方面作出误导性陈述。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Wednesday it was suing the country's bourse operator ASX Ltd for making misleading statements regarding the replacement of its trading platform Clearing House Electronic Subregister System (CHESS).】

item.title: 受中国经济放缓影响，日本 8 月商业景气下滑：路透调查
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 月度调查周三显示，由于中国需求低迷拖累了企业情绪，8 月份日本制造商对经营状况的信心略有下降，服务业的情绪也有所缓和。【原文：Japanese manufacturers turned slightly less confident about business conditions in August and the service sector's mood eased, the monthly Reuters Tankan survey found on Wednesday, as lacklustre demand from China weighed on corporate sentiment.】

item.title: 经济学家称美国提前进口降低了潜在海港罢工的风险
item.description: 一位贸易经济学家周二表示，如果纽约和休斯顿等重要海港的工人在10月份罢工，美国零售商提前进口返校、万圣节和圣诞节假期的货物，可以减少货物延误和经济损失。【原文：U.S. retailers' early back-to-school, Halloween and Christmas holiday imports could lessen cargo delays and financial damage should workers at vital seaports such as New York and Houston strike in October, a trade economist said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 比特币矿商 Riot Platforms 增持竞争对手 Bitfarms 股份至 18.9
item.description: 比特币矿商 Riot Platforms 周二表示，已将其在竞争对手 Bitfarms 的股份增至 18.9%。【原文：Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms said on Tuesday it had increased its stake in rival Bitfarms to 18.9%.】

item.title: 英特尔出售芯片设计公司 Arm Holdings 股份
item.description: 英特尔周二提交的一份监管文件显示，英特尔已出售其持有的英国芯片设计公司Arm Holdings的118万股股票。【原文：Intel has sold its 1.18 million shares in British chip designer Arm Holdings , a regulatory filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国正在考虑拆分谷歌
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，在法官裁定科技巨头非法垄断在线搜索市场一周后，美国司法部正在考虑包括解散 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司在内的各种方案。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice is considering options that include breaking up Alphabet's Google, a week after a judge ruled the tech giant illegally monopolized the online search market, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场摆脱震荡，但能否持久？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长表示，卢拉将在未来几周任命新的央行行长
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）将在未来几周内宣布央行现任行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）在今年任期结束后的领导人选。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday that President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's choice to lead the central bank after the end of current chief Roberto Campos Neto's term this year will be announced in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 由于竞争导致利润率下降，澳大利亚贷款机构 CBA 的年度现金利润下降 3
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）周三表示，由于成本上升和竞争激烈导致利润率下降，该行年度现金利润下滑了 3%。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia said on Wednesday its annual cash profit slipped 3%, as its margins took a beating from rising costs and intense competition.】

item.title: 消息人士称，埃利奥特有望提议西南航空新董事会多数成员人选
item.description: 知情人士周二透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）预计将向西南航空公司发起董事会挑战，提名多达 10 名董事候选人，因为该对冲基金希望该公司撤换首席执行官并改善业绩。【原文：Elliott Investment Management is expected to launch a board room challenge at Southwest Airlines , nominating as many as 10 director candidates as the hedge fund wants the company to oust its chief executive officer and improve performance, sources said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西部长称，拉美航空考虑可能购买多达 30 架巴西航空工业公司喷气式飞机
item.description: 巴西港口和机场部长周二表示，拉美航空有可能从巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司购买多达 30 架飞机，因为该航空公司希望扩大在拉丁美洲最大经济体的业务。【原文：LATAM Airlines could potentially buy as many as 30 aircraft from Brazilian planemaker Embraer as the carrier looks to expand operations in Latin America's largest economy, Brazil's ports and airports minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州起诉通用汽车涉嫌收集、出售司机私人数据
item.description: 通用汽车公司被德克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）起诉，指控该汽车制造商在未经驾驶员同意的情况下将其私人数据出售给包括保险公司在内的多家公司。【原文：General Motors has been sued by Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, who accused the automaker of selling drivers' private data to several companies, including insurers, without their consent.】

item.title: 莱茵金属将斥资 9.5 亿美元收购军用车辆零部件制造商 Loc Performance
item.description: 德国莱茵金属防务集团周二表示，将以 9.5 亿美元的价格收购美国军用车辆零部件制造商 Loc Performance。【原文：Rheinmetall would buy U.S.-based military vehicle parts maker Loc Performance in a $950 million deal, the German defense group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Fanduel 的所有者 Flutter 提高了指导价，但未计划在美国征收附加费
item.description: Flutter 在第二季度的业绩远好于预期后，上调了全年业绩指引，并表示 "现阶段 "没有计划效仿竞争对手 Draftkings，对美国高税收州的客户赢利征收附加费。【原文：Flutter raised its full-year guidance after a much better than expected second quarter and said it has no plans "at this stage" to follow rival Draftkings in adding a surcharge to customer's winnings in high-tax U.S. states.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司起诉广告商一案的德克萨斯州法官退庭
item.description: 在有报道称埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 持有马斯克另一家公司特斯拉（Tesla）的股份后，德克萨斯州负责审理该案的一名联邦法官已将自己从该案中撤出。【原文：A federal judge in Texas assigned to hear a lawsuit by Elon Musk's social media platform X against a group of advertisers has removed himself from the case following reports that he owned shares of another Musk company, Tesla .】

item.title: Tilray 将从 Molson Coors 收购四家手工酿酒厂
item.description: Tilray Brands 公司周二表示，将从啤酒制造商 Molson Coors 手中收购四家手工酿酒厂，以拓展大麻产品以外的业务。【原文：Tilray Brands would buy four craft breweries from beer maker Molson Coors in a bid to expand business beyond its range of cannabis products, the company said on Tuesday .】

item.title: 中国 7 月新增贷款创 15 年新低，预计将采取更多政策措施
item.description: 受信贷需求不振和季节性因素拖累，中国 7 月份银行贷款下滑幅度超过预期，创下近 15 年来的最低水平，这也引发了市场对央行可能会采取更多宽松措施的预期。【原文：China's bank lending tumbled more than expected in July, hitting the lowest in nearly 15 years, dragged down by tepid credit demand and seasonal factors and raising expectations that the central bank may dole out more easing steps.】

item.title: 英特尔被解雇的犹太裔员工起诉前主管涉嫌反犹太主义
item.description: 英特尔公司的一名犹太裔前雇员周二起诉了这家芯片制造商，称他因抱怨自己的上司公开赞美反犹太主义、哈马斯和针对以色列的恐怖主义而被解雇。【原文：A Jewish former employee of Intel sued the chipmaker on Tuesday, saying he was fired after complaining that the senior executive he reported to openly celebrated antisemitism, Hamas and terrorism against Israel.】

item.title: 谷歌 Fitbit 和 Peloton 宣布建立健身内容合作关系
item.description: 谷歌公司和 Peloton Interactive 公司周二表示，Fitbit 已与 Peloton Interactive 合作，从 9 月初开始，Fitbit 的高级用户可以访问这家健身器材制造商的健身内容。【原文：Google's Fitbit has partnered with Peloton Interactive to give its premium users access to the exercise equipment maker's fitness content, starting early September, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称还需 "更多数据 "才能准备好降息
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，最近的经济数据让他 "更有信心 "美国央行能让通胀率回到2%的目标，但他希望在准备支持降息之前看到 "更多一点的数据"。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic on Tuesday said recent economic data has made him "more confident" the U.S. central bank can get inflation back to the 2% target, but he wants to see "a little more data" before he's ready to support lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 研究显示，德国和意大利进口了法律上可疑的巴西黄金
item.description: 一家智库周二表示，德国进口的所有巴西黄金和意大利进口的71%巴西黄金都来自亚马逊地区，那里的非法采矿活动十分猖獗，该智库呼吁欧洲加强监督。【原文：All Brazilian gold imports by Germany and 71% by Italy come from areas of the Amazon where illegal mining is rampant, a think thank said on Tuesday, calling for increased European scrutiny.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 CBA 面临市场主导地位考验，年度盈利下降迫在眉睫
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）是澳大利亚最大的贷款机构，预计将于周三公布年度盈利的小幅下降，投资者关注的焦点是存款支付和不良贷款的增加是否会超过抵押贷款收入的增长。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia , the country's biggest lender, is expected to unveil a small decline in annual earnings on Wednesday, with investors focused on whether rising deposit payouts and bad loans will outweigh gains in mortgage revenue.】

item.title: 永明美国牙科业务出现季度亏损，但有望在 2025 年盈利 1 亿美元
item.description: Sun Life Financial Inc 首席执行官凯文-斯特恩（Kevin Strain）周二表示，该公司的美国牙科保险业务在最近一个季度出现亏损后正在好转，有望在 2025 年实现该业务盈利 1 亿美元的目标。【原文：Sun Life Financial Inc CEO Kevin Strain said on Tuesday the company's U.S. dental insurance business was improving after losing money in the latest quarter, and was on track to hit its goal for $100 million in earnings in that segment in 2025.】

item.title: 法国麦当劳在篮球赛输给美国队后开玩笑说要取消咖喱酱
item.description: 法国麦当劳说，它正考虑在下届奥运会之前从菜单上撤下咖喱酱，以示对美国篮球队队长斯蒂芬-库里（Stephen Curry）的抗议。【原文：McDonald's France said it is considering taking curry sauce off its menus until the next Olympics in a joke protest over U.S. basketball team captain Stephen Curry, whose last-gasp heroics denied France gold at the Paris Games.】

item.title: 谷歌推出人工智能驱动的新手机和其他小工具
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周二发布了一系列新款 Pixel 智能手机，这些手机更深入地集成了谷歌的人工智能技术，谷歌正努力将人工智能融入其硬件中。【原文：Alphabet’s Google on Tuesday unveiled a lineup of new Pixel smartphones with deeper integrations of itsartificial intelligence technology as it races to incorporate AI into its hardware.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司和通用动力公司宣布达成制造火箭发动机的协议
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）和通用动力公司（General Dynamics）周二宣布了一项制造固体火箭发动机的协议，因为固体火箭发动机持续短缺，导致导弹生产受限。【原文：Lockheed Martin and General Dynamics on Tuesday announced an agreement to build solid rocket motors amid an ongoing shortage that has capped production of missiles.】

item.title: 星巴克聘请 Chipotle 的尼科尔担任第六任首席执行官
item.description: 星巴克周二任命 Chipotle Mexican Grill 的布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）为新任首席执行官，接替执掌星巴克近一年半的拉克斯曼-纳拉西姆汉（Laxman Narasimhan），这是星巴克全球咖啡连锁店最高领导层任职时间最短的一位。【原文：Starbucks on Tuesday named Chipotle Mexican Grill's Brian Niccol as its new CEO, replacing Laxman Narasimhan, who was at the helm for close to a year and a half, the shortest span for a top boss at the global coffee chain.】
